name: Avenging Spirit
description:
A classic action game that provided a unique gameplay system of possessing and controlling other characters is now available on the Nintendo eShop!

While out on a walk with his girlfriend, the daughter of a prestigious scientist, our poor hero is gunned down by an evil syndicate that wants to harness ghost energy, and plans on ransoming the poor girl to force her father into helping them. But our hero's adventure isn't over. In fact, it's just beginning! He's come back as a ghost so that he can rescue his girlfriend from her kidnappers and finally rest in peace!

Whoever said love was easy? With six fun and exciting stages, help reunite the protagonist with his beloved. Watch the moving ending as this hero's quest for revenge is finally put to rest!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
